name: Silken Moon's Serenade
four_pc: When dealing Elemental DMG, gain the Gleaming Moon: Devotion effect for 8s: Increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 60/120 when the party's Moonsign is Nascent Gleam/Ascendant Gleam. The equipping character can trigger this effect while off-field. All party members' Lunar Reaction DMG is increased by 10% for each different Gleaming Moon effect that party members have. Effects from Gleaming Moon cannot stack.

goblet.name: Joyous Glory of the Pure
goblet.description: An immaculate silver cup said to have been used in the bygone rituals of the Frostmoon Scions. Their modern rites have no need for such a vessel.

plume.name: Pristine Plume of the Blessed
plume.description: An immaculate feathered accessory said to have been forged by the first Moonchanter herself.

circlet.name: Holy Crown of the Believer
circlet.description: An immaculate adornment created in imitation of the envoy of the grove's antlers.

flower.name: Crystal Tear of the Wanderer
flower.description: An immaculate flower whose beauty is said to have been preserved for eternity by the icy wind.

sands.name: Frost Devotee's Delirium
sands.description: An immaculate timepiece that long ago ceased turning, along with the delusions of its former owner.
